body:
I added variants for libraries that have external dependencies.
- mpi to activate Boost.MPI and graph_parallel (default: False)
- python for Boost.Python and mpi_python if mpi is activated (default: False)
- compression for the `zlib` and `bzip2` compression in Boost.Iostream (default: True)

I changed the default compilation options to build the static and shared libraries in single and multi-threaded version. With the tagged layout they are disambiguated by addition of the `-mt` suffix.
title: Boost: mpi, python and compression for iostream variants
